# TheIdServer

[TheIdServer](https://github.com/Aguafrommars/TheIdServer) is an [OpenID/Connect](https://openid.net/connect/) server based on [IdentityServer4](https://identityserver4.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).


## Get generated certificates

Use the command:

```bash
kubectl get secret {{ .Realease.Name }}-certs -o jsonpath="{.data['{{ .Certificate.Name }}\.key']}" --namespace {{ .Release.Namespace }}
```

Where:

* {{ .Realease.Name }} is the name of your release
* {{ .Certificate.Name }} is the name of the certificate (ssl, dataProtection or signingKey)
* {{ .Release.Namespace }} is your k8s namespace

ex:

```bash
‚ùØ kubectl get secret theidserver-certs -o jsonpath="{.data['dataProtection\.key']}" --namespace theidserver

```
